alert.note: Alert for Lee; Scott; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 5:09PM EDT until May 16 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lee County in southwestern Virginia... Western Scott County in southwestern Virginia... Southwestern Wise County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 509 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cranks, or near Jonesville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jonesville, Big Stone Gap, Pennington Gap, St. Charles, Duffield, Clinchport, Jasper, Dryden, Rose Hill and Pattonsville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
